content.rendered:
Directed by Prakash Raj

Written by Sagar Haveli. Surrya Menen. Dileesh Nair. Syam Pushkaran

Cast Lillete Dubey (Samantha). Ali Fazal (Siddharth). Iravati Harshe (Urmi). Naveen Kaushik (Danny). Taapsee Pannu (Nicole). Nana Patekar (Tukaram). Shriya Saran (Madhura). Anurag Sharma (Young Journalist). Murali Sharma (Tebli (as Murli Sharma)). Rajesh Sharma (The cook)

Languages Hindi

Producers Dilip Borkar. Sameer Dixit. Sudeep Ghoshal. Girish Johar. Sudhir Narayan Sherigar. Madhumita Sundararaman. Jatish Varma

Production Little Red Car Films. Movie Makers. Zee Studios
